trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Mobile
There were no other sightings in Mobile on or around November 3rd 2003
Summary: Large bright white triangular object seen over Mobile
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a grocery store waiting for my cab and, I was looking out the front window of the store. The object grabbed my eye as it appeared from the NW and flew south and then zigged back north and imediately zigged south. The object was bright white and triangular moving quickly south. Seeing the object brought a cosmic type of mind to me, very calming. The event only lasted about a minute.
